Title: The Whole Blah Damn Thing
Plot: Nancy makes her first successful smuggling run across the border with both drugs and human cargo. Meanwhile, Captain Till strikes a deal with Celia to get her out of jail. In return, she must gather evidence to incriminate Nancy and Guillermo. Back in Ren Mar, Andy tries to convince the family, including his father, to put Bubbie out of her misery.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Albert Brooks, Maia Madison, Becky Thyre, Lisa Darr
